content: single_crochet around the armhole 7ch * double_crochet ch1 double_crochet in next chain double_crochet in each of next 6ch * repeat join with slip_stitch in first single_crochet from * 5 times more double_crochet in each of next 3ch turn round 2 ch1 single_crochet in next st *ch1 skip next st single_crochet in next st* repeat form * 16 17 times more join with slip_stitch in chain-1 row 2 ch3 double_crochet in next 9 double_crochet * double_crochet ch1 double_crochet in next chain-1 round 3 ch2 skip next single_crochet *single_crochet in next chain-1 space ch1 skip next space double_crochet in each of next 8 double_crochet* repeat from * 5 times single_crochet* repeat form * 16 17 times more join with slip_stitch in first more double_crochet in next 2dc turn chain of chain-2 round 4 ch1 single_crochet in next chain-1 space *ch1 skip next single_crochet single_crochet in row 3 ch3 double_crochet in next 10dc * double_crochet ch1 double_crochet in next chain-1 next chain-1 space* repeat form * 16 17 times more join space double_crochet in next 10dc* repeat from * 5 times more double_crochet with slip_stitch in chain-1 in last double_crochet turn repeat rounds 3 and 4 13 16 times more row 4 ch3 double_crochet in next 11dc * double_crochet ch1 double_crochet in next chain-1 space double_crochet in next 12dc* repeat from * 5 times more straps turn make 3 ch13 single_crochet in 7th chain from hook and in each next chain ch6 work row 5 ch3 double_crochet in next 12dc * double_crochet ch1 double_crochet in next chain-1 on opposite side single_crochet in each remaining loop of next 7 sts 8sc space double_crochet in next 14dc* repeat from *4 times more double_crochet in next ch6 space single_crochet in next 7sts 8sc in next ch6 space slip_stitch ch1 double_crochet in next chain-1 space double_crochet in next 13dc turn in next st fasten_off row 6 ch3 double_crochet in next 13dc * double_crochet ch1 double_crochet in next chain-1 weave in all ends space double_crochet in next 16dc* repeat from *4 times more double_crochet sew on the buttons near the opening you can use strap to ch1 double_crochet in next chain-1 space double_crochet in next 14dc turn check in how far they should be positioned attach strap to buttons row 7 ch3 double_crochet in next 14dc * double_crochet ch1 double_crochet in next chain-1 space double_crochet in next 18dc* repeat from *4 times more double_crochet ch1 double_crochet in next chain-1 space double_crochet in next 15dc turn for size 6-12 months continue with the body part for size 12-24 months work next row and then continue with the body part for 12-24 months only row 8 ch3 skip first double_crochet double_crochet in next 15dc * double_crochet ch1 double_crochet in next chain-1 space double_crochet in next 20dc* repeat from *4 times more double_crochet ch1 double_crochet in next chain-1 space double_crochet in next 16dc turn body part instructions are for size 6-12 months changes for size 12-24 months are in … row 1 ch1 single_crochet in each of next 16 17 double_crochet
